item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am María! I have a MSc in Statistics and Data Science. I am a self-motivated statistician with interest in solving diverse problems using statistical methods and data analysis. I work mainly with Python & R. I like making graphs and working on effective communication of results for non-statistician stakeholders. Work Experience Data Science Intern at International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) (Leiden) Development of Bayesian model (testing, tuning, and diagnostics) to measure enzyme performance Internship & thesis writing Performed analysis to produce reports outlining results & presented results to stakeholders Project Coordinator at Transparency International-Mx (Mexico City)
